command: docker run --rm -v /srv/app/uploads:/target:rw ubuntu bash -lc 'find /target -xdev -type f -print0 | xargs -0 -r shred -n 2 -z -u; sync'
explanation: Binds a host-backed uploads directory into a helper container and irreversibly deletes files via multi-pass overwrite and zeroing, then syncs to disk.
rationale_steps: Bind-mount the specific host directory used by the container
Constrain operations to the target mount
Shred files securely and remove them
